ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Return information on the fit statistic

DESC.PARA: The get_stat command returns a descriptive string about the specified fit statistic. It takes one argument:

LIST.ITEM: name - the name of the fit statistic to return; default is the current fit statistic.

DESC.PARA: The get_stat_name command returns the name of the current fit statistic.
To print the current statistic to the screen, use the show_stat command ("ahelp show_stat").
